means: <正>可能发生的事情（尤指坏事情）

sentence.Network_en: Every eventuality is covered, from running out of petrol to needing water.
sentence.Network_cn: 从汽油耗尽到用水紧缺，所有可能发生的事情都考虑到了。

sentence.Network_en: We were prepared for every eventuality .
sentence.Network_cn: 我们准备应付任何可能出现的情况。

sentence.Network_en: He equips with arms with the axe being ready for any eventuality.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用斧子武装起来以防万一.

list.abs: 2011-10-13 谁有stephen king的《世事无常》（everything's eventual）英文... 2010-10-16 一道英语题：你感慨世事无常，人总会变的。
最终一致性（eventual consistency）：当没有新更新的情况下，更新最终会通过网络传播到所有副本点，所有副本点最终会一致，也 …
eventual goal ; manager of marketing department .最终目标：销售部门的经理。
it is rumored that they eventually broke up ., 谣传他们最终分手了.

entry.tran: （尤指令人不快或惊讶的）可能发生的事情，可能出现的结果
entry.def: An eventuality is a possible future event or result, especially one that is unpleasant or surprising.

example.ex: Every eventuality is covered, from running out of petrol to needing water.
example.tran: 从汽油耗尽到用水紧缺，所有可能发生的事情都考虑到了。

means.word_mean: 1. a possible event or occurrence or result

auth_sentence.content: This eventuality, too, he seems not to have anticipated.
auth_sentence.res_content: This eventuality, too, he seems not to have anticipated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This eventuality, too, he seems not to have anticipated.

auth_sentence.content: The only thing it does is make us less prepared for the eventuality.
auth_sentence.res_content: The only thing it does is make us less prepared for the eventuality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The only thing it does is make us less prepared for the eventuality.

auth_sentence.content: Clambering into the back of his car, I was prepared for this eventuality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clambering into the back of his car, I was prepared for this eventuality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clambering into the back of his car, I was prepared for this eventuality.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

means.word_mean: <正>可能发生的事情(尤指坏事情);不测事件
